tool_description:
Geo location information by user internet address.
IP geographical info including continent, country, district, city, lantitude and longitude, currency, phone-code etc.

function.name: get_ip_geo_info
function.description:
Get geo location information for the given ip address in ipv4 or ipv6 format.
